cab.content: This Dnr.Mfhent is the Property of(Received 19th.)6743. 17th May. '.Part I. British representative, Kandahar, arrived Quetta, reports garrison, Kandahar, had not moved out up to 12th instant, the day he left. Also reports no reinforcement of Fort Baldak, and no troops seen on road. Jehad being preached, Kandahar, and people buying arms.Part II. On 16th May opposition was offered to posting of pickets south of Ali Masjid. On same day force from Dakka, reconnoitring towards Basawal, met with slight resistance, and on return enemy considerably reinforced, following up, an engagement ensued. No details yet received. No change in situation reported from other sources.
